Class PopUpHighscore

java.lang.Object
com.game.score.PopUpHighscore
public class PopUpHighscore
extends java.lang.Object
Renders the Pop-up Highscore window.

  • Method Details

    • display

      public void display​(javafx.scene.layout.VBox layout)
      Displays the Pop-up Highscore window. Gets called by Score.createTimer().

    • setRanking

      public void setRanking​(javafx.scene.layout.VBox layout)
      Initialises the Pop-up Highscore window's properties. This method gets highscores from file and adds it to the Pop-up Highscore window. Gets called by Score.createTimer().

    • setTextProperties

      public void setTextProperties​(javafx.scene.text.Text text, java.lang.String str, int fsize, javafx.scene.paint.Color fill, javafx.scene.paint.Color stroke)
      Sets some properties of the Text object.
      Parameters:
      text - Text object.
      str - Text's content.
      fsize - Font size.
      fill - Text fill colour.
      stroke - Stroke colour.

    • gethsStage

      public static javafx.stage.Stage gethsStage()
      Allows other classes to have access to the Pop-up Highscore Stage.
      Returns:
      pophsStage
